location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Peter Elwin Wrench, Robert Garden, and Dymoke Lyster, Agent and Council at Bussora [Basra], to Benjamin Jervis, East India Company Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter goes through the logistics of getting a shipment of goods to Basra via the Tartarand a packet to Bombay either aboard the Londonor via Muscatt [Muscat]. There is a request for updates on Carem Caun's [Karim Khan] movements around Cormooge [Khormoj].
